manifest.name: dom-converter
manifest.description: converts bare objects to DOM objects or xml representations

scripts.watch: npm run compile:watch & npm run test:watch
scripts.winwatch: start/b npm run compile:watch & npm run test:watch

manifest.readme:
Converts bare objects to DOM objects, compatible with htmlparser2's DOM objects.

This is useful when you want to work with DOM without having to compose/parse html.
